name: 蕭勝輝
objective: 本課程將教授質譜、紅外線光譜、核磁共振光譜及紫外線光譜等所提供的互補資料來鑑定有機化合物的結構。除了光譜的解釋之外，也會教授基本的分析原理。
schedule:
週次/單元主題
1/課程介紹
2~3/Introduction to ”Spectrometric Identification of Organic Compounds”
4/Chapter 1. Molecular Formulas and What can be Learned from Them
5/Chapter 2. Infrared Spectroscopy
6~7/Chapter 3. Nuclear Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy--Part One: Basic Concepts
8/Chapter 4. Nuclear Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy--Part Two: Carbon-13 Spectra, Including Heteronuclear Coupling with Other Nuclei
9/期中考
10~11/Chapter 5. Nuclear Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy--Part Three: Spin-Spin Coupling
12~13/Chapter 6. Nuclear Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy--Part Four: Other Topics in One-Dimensional NMR
14/Chapter 7. Ultraviolet Spectroscopy
15/Chapter 8. Mass Spectroscopy
16/Chapter 9. Combined Structure Problems
17/Chapter 10. Nuclear Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy--Part Five: Advanced NMR Techniques
18/期末考
scorePolicy: 出缺勤、學習態度、作業、期中考、期末考
materials:
教科書：Donald L. Pavia, Gary M. Lampman, George S. Kriz, and James R. Vyvyan, Introduction to Spectroscopy, 4th Edition, Brooks/Cole, Cengage Learning, Belmont, 2009.
參考書：R. M. Silverstein, F. X. Weber, and D. Kiemle, Spectrometric Identification of Organic Compounds, 7th Edition, John Wiley, New York, 2005.
